mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notes(notesno, adminno, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(notes_seq.nextval, #{adminno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT notesno, adminno, title, content, cnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM notes ORDER BY notesno DESC
SELECT notesno, adminno, title, content, cnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved FROM notes WHERE notesno = #{notesno}

SELECT notesno, adminno, title, content, rdate FROM notes
WHERE (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY notesno DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM notes
WHERE (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
